items.sentence: Someone broke into my car and stole my guitar.
Tom has been charged with first degree murder.
I couldn\'t understand what he was getting at.
I\'m not sure I want to know what\'s going on.
I don\'t like the kind of food that Tom makes.
I don\'t think that Tom would let you do that.
Tom makes it a rule not to eat after 8:00 p.m.
I\'m getting very little cooperation from Tom.
I don\'t feel like dealing with Tom right now.
I can\'t tell you how sad I am about all this.
